title: BLM in Our Schools | Guests: Dr. Voddie Baucham & Dr. Scott Atlas | 7/13/20
description:
Black Lives Matter curriculum is rolling out into our schools to push a progressive wish list. Glenn and Pat discuss conspiracy theories that Wayfair is trafficking people through cabinet sales. Is anything NOT political any more? Glenn puts Roger Stone’s commutation in context. Dr. Voddie Baucham explains the concept of “woke Shahada” and how the religious aspects of the Black Lives Matter moment have been embraced even by Christians. Everything in “1984” is happening now, including the redefining of terms. Hoover Institution senior fellow Dr. Scott Atlas breaks down the reality of COVID-19 and why the science supports reopening schools. The Washington Redskins announced they WILL change their name.
